import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FakestoreService } from 'src/app/services/fakestore.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private fakestore:FakestoreService,private router:Router){} //declare a variable to hold the data products:any[]=[]; ngOnInit():void{ this.fakestore.getProductAll().subscribe((products:any)=>{ console.table(products); this.products=products; }); } goToCreate(){ this.router.navigate(['/src/app/components/create']); } }
